1 egg
1 teaspoon baking powder
a little water
recipeText: Mix ingredients together. Drop into simmering soup. Cover and cook for about 15 - 20 minutes.

ingredientList:
1 cup mandarin oranges
1 2/3 cups pineapple chunks or crushed
1 cup flaked coconut
1 cup sour cream cultured
1 cup miniature marshmallows
1/3 cup red cherries
recipeText:
Combine ingredients and chill overnight.

*can use fruit cocktail.

ingredientList:
Sweet Dough Crust:
1 cup water Temp Per Yeast Instructions
1 egg
1/4 cup sugar
1 package Rapid Rise yeast
3 1/2 cups flour
1 teaspoon salt

Filling:
1 cottage cheese
1 1/2 cups sugar
6 eggs
Cinnamon on Top
recipeText: Bake for 1 hour at 325 degrees.

recipeDescription: This is like Mock Angel Food Cake.
ingredientList:
2 cups cake flour
2 cups sugar
1 cup broiling water

pinch of salt
2 teaspoons baking powder
5 egg whites 
vanilla
1/2 tsp cream of Tarter

FROSTING:
5 egg yokes
1 small can carnation milk
1 cup sugar
recipeText:
Sift cake flour and sugar 4 times.  Add one cup boiling water.  Mix together well and cover with a plate.  Let stand overnight on the counter.

The next morning: add salt and baking soda.  Mix well.  

Beat egg whites with vanilla until stiff.  Add Cream of Tarter and fold into the rest of the mixture.  Don't whip; turn ingredients together with a spatula.

Cook in Double Boiler.  Bake at 350 degrees for 35-40 minutes.  Bake on lowest shelf.

Make the frosting and spread on cake.  Can sprinkle with nuts.

ingredientList:
3 cups white corn syrup
3 tablespoons vinegar
1 teaspoon salt
1 teaspoon vanilla extract
3 quarts popped corn
recipeText:
Boil all ingredients except popped corn until mixture forms a hard ball when dropped from spoon into cold water.

Pour over popped corn and form into 3" balls.

ingredientList:
1 pkg jello
1 pkg koolaid any flavor
1 cup sugar
2 cups Hot water
2 cups cold water
recipeText:
Dissolve above ingredients in 2 cups hot water.

Add 2 cups cold water. Mix well.

Pour into popsicle containers. Freeze.

*I preferred less sugar

ingredientList:
5 cups rhubarb cut small pieces
3 cups sugar
1/2 cup water
1 package red jello
recipeText:
Cover rhubarb with boiling water and let set. 
 
Drain well.  

Add sugar and 1/2 cup water.  

Boil 10 minutes.  

Add jello. 

Seal jars.

ingredientList:
3 diced apples do not peel
1/2 cup chopped celery
2 to 3 tablespoons mayonnaise
1/8 teaspoon salt
1/4 cup chopped nuts
recipeText: We like it better with 1/2 cup whipped cream mixed with mayonnaise.

ingredientList:
2 tablespoons olive oil
2 tablespoons brown sugar
2 tablespoons apple cider vinegar
1 teaspoon Dijon style mustard
1/4 teaspoon pepper
6 fillets salmon, thawed
recipeText:
Combine all ingredients except salmon fillets to make marinade.

Place salmon in shallow glass dish and pour 1/2 of the marinade over the salmon.  Reserve remaining marinade.

Cover and refrigerate one hour.

Discard marinade from glass dish.  Grill salmon over medium heat approximately 4 - 6 minutes.  Brush with reserved marinade several times during grilling.

ingredientList:
vanilla extract
powdered sugar
butter
heavy whipping cream
Salt
if using salted butter leave out the salt
recipeText: Mix all ingredients together.

ingredientList:
1 cup milk
3 tablespoons flour
1 cup butter, softened to room temperature
1 cup sugar
vanilla extract
recipeText:
Cook milk and flour until thick. Let cool.

Cream butter, sugar and vanilla. Add cooled milk and flour mixture.

Combine.  Should be light and fluffy.

recipeDescription: Found on Facebook.  Supposed to be very good.
ingredientList:
4 sticks unsalted butter store in refrigerator
8 cups confectioners' sugar sifted
large pinch of salt
1-3 tablespoons whole milk as needed
extract and flavoring
recipeText: Mix together. Adjust the consistency with milk as needed.

ingredientList:
1 1/2 cups crisco
2 pounds powdered sugar
1/2 teaspoon salt
1 teaspoon almond extract
1/2-1 teaspoon vanilla extract
1/2 cup hot water (maybe a little more)
recipeText: Put hot water on top of everything.  Beat until it forms stiff peaks.

recipeDescription: Prep Time: 15 minutes - Yield: frosts 2-layer or 13 x 9-inch cake
ingredientList:
1 cup sugar
1 cup evaporated milk
1/2 cup margarine or butter, softened
3 eggs, beaten
1 1/3 cups flaked coconut
1 cup chopped pecans or almonds
1 teaspoon vanilla extract
recipeText:
In medium saucepan, combine sugar, milk, margarine and eggs. Cook over medium heat until mixture begins to bubble, stirring constantly.

Stir in all remaining ingredients. 

Cool until of desired spreading consistency.

ingredientList:
2 1/2 tablespoons flour
1/2 cup milk
1/2 cup sugar
1/2 cup butter
recipeText:
2 1/2 tablespoons flour
1/2 cup milk
Cook flour and milk together to create a paste.  Cool completely.
Beat sugar and butter, add paste mixture, and beat a few minutes.

*Can also add a touch of vanilla and salt.

ingredientList:
6 tablespoons butter
1 cup sugar
6 tablespoons milk
butterscotch or chocolate chips
recipeText: Bring to a boil and boil for 4 minutes (only).  Add 1/2 cup chocolate chip or butterscotch until it tastes good.

ingredientList:
1 egg white
2 cups powdered sugar
1/2 cup shortening (Crisco)
1/2 teaspoon salt
2 1/2 tablespoons milk
2 tablespoons cake flour
Flavoring extract if desired
Food coloring if desired
recipeText:
Beat egg white until stiff.  Add 1 cup powdered sugar, beat.

In a separate bowl, mix 1 cup powdered sugar, shortening, salt, milk, flour, and flavoring.  Beat until well blended.  

Add the egg and powdered sugar mixture.  Beat well until the frosting stands in peaks, about 4 - 5 minutes. 

Use tooth pick to add food coloring and flavoring.

ingredientList:
3 cups sifted powdered sugar
2/3 cup shortening
2 1/2 tablespoons water
1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract, white
recipeText: Mix until smooth.

ingredientList:
1 ounce chocolate
1 cup sugar
1/3 cup milk
1/4 cup margarine or crisco
1/4 teaspoon salt
recipeText:
Mix all ingredients and bring to a boil. Boil 1 minute. 

Beat until cold add milk if to hard.

ingredientList:
2 squares chocolate
2 tablespoons butter
2 cups sugar
3/4 cup milk
pinch of salt
recipeText:
Melt butter and chocolate. Add sugar and milk. Cook until it forms into soft ball in cold water. 

Remove from stove and leave until cool. 

Beat until creamy and smooth. If it get to stiff to beat add a drop or two of milk.

ingredientList:
1/2 cup butter or margarine (half shortening may be used.)
1 cup brown sugar
1/4 cup milk
2 cups sifted powdered sugar
recipeText:
Melt butter, add brown sugar.  Boil over low heat 2 minutes, stirring constantly.

Add milk and continue stirring until mixture come to a boi. Remove from heat and cool.

Slowly add powdered sugar, beating well after each addition until spreading consistency.

Spread on cake.

recipeName: Calico Bean Bake - Jan from Oak Hills
recipeDescription: Jan from Oak Hills - Very Good Cook
ingredientList:
1 pound ground beef or Pork (I Use Pork, Juicier)
1 cup chopped onions
1/2 pound chopped bacon
1/2 cup ketchup
3/4 cup brown sugar
2 teaspoons vinegar
1 teaspoon salt
1 teaspoon dry mustard
1 pound 12 oz pork and beans
1 pound can butter beans
1 pound can kidney beans
recipeText:
Brown meat, cut up bacon, and onions in skillet. Add the rest of the ingredients and mix well. 

Bake in Casserole, uncovered at 350 degrees for 45 minutes.

I put in a crockpot on low for several hours stirring several times.

Crock Pot works just as well or even better, than baking in oven.

ingredientList:
2 pounds ground beef
20-ounce package frozen French fries
1 can golden mushroom soup
1 can cheddar cheese soup
recipeText:
Brown the ground beef. Drain the fat. Place the cooked meat in the bottom of a 9 x 13 pan.

Combine the soups and spread over the meat. Sprinkle french fries over the top.

Bake at 350 degrees for 45 to 55 minutes, until the fries are golden. 

Garnish with hamburger toppings- pickles, etc. if you like.

ingredientList:
1 pound egg noodles, cooked and drained
1 onion
1 cup celery
5 tablespoons margarine or butter
4 cups chicken
1 can cream of mushroom soup
3 cups chicken broth
6 tablespoons flour
Dash salt
Dash pepper
1 cup grated cheddar cheese
recipeText:
Dice onion and celery, cook in butter.  Add chicken, soup, broth, and flour.  Salt and pepper to taste.  Sprinkle on cheese.  

Bake at 350 degrees  for 1 hour.

ingredientList:
2 chicken breasts
2 cans mixed vegetables
1 can cream of chicken soup
1 can cream of potato soup
pie crust
recipeText:
Cube chicken and sautee chicken. Mix chicken with vegetables and soups.

Add milk to make more soupy if desired.

Pour mixture into pie crust, top with other Pie Crust.

Bake 45 min until crust is done.

ingredientList:
1/2 Cup - 1 Cup celery
1/4 -1/2 cup onion
chicken, turkey or hamburger meat
1 28-oz can chow main vegetables
1 8-oz can sliced Water chestnuts
salt
pepper
flour
soy sauce
bag of chow main noodles
recipeText:
Cook and chop the chosen meat, save juice.

Brown celery & onion in butter.  Combine with meat, juice, vegetables, and chestnuts.

Add salt and pepper to taste.

Simmer for 15 Minutes.

Thicken with flour and water.

Add Soy sauce to taste.

*I usually double this recipe.

ingredientList:
1/2 of a chicken or 1 pound of hamburger
6 tablespoons soy sauce
1 cup water
1 large bunch of celery, cut in 1/2 inch pieces
1 small onion, chopped
2 tablespoons cornstarch
1/4 cup water
1 (10 1/2-ounce) can water chestnuts, drained & sliced
2 1/2 cups bean sprouts, drained
2 ounces can mushrooms
dash salt
dash pepper
1 can chow main mixed vegetables
1 bag chow main noodles
recipeText:
Brown meat in oil or meat fat. Add soy sauce and 1 cup of water. Simmer 2 minutes.

Add celery and onion. Simmer 1.5 hours.

Blend corn starch and 1/4 cup water stir into meat mixture. Add chestnuts, bean sprouts, veggies, and mushrooms. Heat through, season and serve over chow main noodles, or cool and freeze.

ingredientList:
24 ounces pkg hash brown patties
1 pound hamberger
1 chopped onion
1 box frozen peas
1 cup celery diced
1 can cream of mushroom soup
1 can cream of chicken soup
1/2 cup sour cream with chives
2 cups Cheddar cheese shredded
small can French Fried Onions
recipeText:
Put the hash brown patties into a buttered 9 x 13 or larger pan. 

Brown the hamburger, onion and celery. Spread over the hash browns. Sprinkle the peas over the hamburger layer. 

Combine the soups and sour cream. Spread over the other layers, sprinkle the cheese over the soup mixture. Sprinkle the fried onions on top.

Bake uncovered at 350 degrees for 45 minutes or more.

ingredientList:
3 cups frozen hash brown potatoes
3/4 cup shredded pepper jack cheese
1 cup cooked ham diced
1/4 cup green onions
4 eggs beat
1-12 ounces can evaporated milk
1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper
1/8 teaspoon salt
recipeText:
Heat oven to 350 degrees. 

Grease pan.  Spread hash browns evenly in bottom of pan.  Sprinkle with pepper jack cheese, ham, and green onion.

In a bowl, mix eggs, evaporated milk, pepper, and salt.  Pour the egg mixture over the potatoes.

May cover and refrigerate for several hours or overnight.

Bake for  40-45 minutes or 50-60 minutes if made ahead and ingredients are cold.

It is ready when knives comes out clean in the middles if pan.  Let stand for 5 minutes.

ingredientList:
2 pounds hamburger
onions chopped
seasoning to taste
2 10 1/2 ounce cans vegetable soup
1 pound frozen French fries
recipeText:
Brown hamburger, onion and seasoning. Add vegetable soup. Put into a 2 quart casserole dish.

Bake at 350 degrees for 30 minutes.

Remove from the oven and add the French Fries. 

Return to oven and bake for another 30 minutes.

ingredientList:
1 pound ground beef
1/2 cup onions
5 potatoes
4 carrots
1 cup celery (optional)
1 can cream of mushroom soup
1 cup water
1 tablespoon Worcestershire sauce (optional)
1 can corn
recipeText:
Brown the beef and the onions.  Chop potatoes, carrots, and celery.  Mix all ingredients and place in a cake pan.

Bake at 350 degrees for 30 - 40 minutes.

ingredientList:
Sauce:
20-oz can tomato
8-oz can tomato sauce
6-oz can tomato paste
2 cups water
garlic salt
salt
sweet basil
dry mustard
Worcestershire sauce
green pepper
onion
some catsup

Meat and Noodles:
2 pounds hamburger
1 pound lasagna noodles
2 T. oil

Cottage Cheese Mix:
2 eggs
1 quart cottage cheese
salt
pepper
parsley

Grated Cheese:
1 pack cheddar cheese, grated
1 package mozzarella cheese, grated
recipeText:
Brown the ground hamburger meat.  Mix the sauce ingredients.  Add sauce to meat and simmer for 3 hours.

Cook noodles with oil.  Drain in cold water and set aside.

Beat eggs and mix in the rest of the cottage cheese mix ingredients.

In a 9 X 13 Pan, alternate layers of noodles, cottage cheese mix, grated cheeses and meat sauce.  End the top layer with meat sauce topped with grated cheese.

Bake at 350 degrees.

ingredientList:
1/3 cup olive oil
1 1/2 teaspoons salt
1 teaspoon black pepper
1 tablespoon paprika
2 tablespoons garlic powder
2 tablespoons hot sauce
6-8 skin on red potatoes cut in 1/2 cubes
1 pound chicken breasts, cubed
2 cups fiesta blend cheese
1 cup bacon, cooked and crumbled (about 1/2 pound)
1 cup green onions diced
recipeText:
Pre heat oven to 400 degrees. Spray a 9 x13 baking dish with cooking spray.

In a large bowl, mix together the olive oil, salt , pepper, paprika, garlic powder, and hot sauce. Add the cubed potatoes and chicken and stir to coat. 

Carefully scoop the potatoes and chicken into the prepared baking dish.


Bake the potatoes and chicken for 55-60 minutes, stirring every 20 minutes until cooked through crispy and browned on the outside. 

When potatoes and chicken are fully cooked removed from oven. 

Top the cooked potatoes with the cheese, bacon and green onions. Return the casserole to the oven and bake for 5 minutes or until cheese is melted.

Serve with hot sauce, ranch dressing, or sour cream.

ingredientList:
7 ounces small macaroni
1 medium onion, chopped
1 small green pepper, chopped
1 pound ground beef
1 cup cottage cheese
2 1/2 cups spaghetti sauce
1 4-ounce can mushrooms
2 teaspoons oregano
1 cup sour cream
1/4 cup Parmesan cheese, shredded
recipeText:
Cook macaroni, rinse, drain.  Brown the meat.  Saute the pepper and onion.  Add the remaining ingredients and cooked macaroni to a 3-quart casserole.  

Bake 45 minutes at 350 degrees covered.  

Remove the cover, sprinkle cheese on top and bake for another 15 minutes.

ingredientList:
2 pounds frozen hash browns
1 can cream of celery soup
1 cup cream of mushroom soup
1 8-oz container sour cream and chives
shredded cheddar cheese
recipeText:
Mix in layers and bake at 300 degrees, slow for 2 to 4 hours, or until brown on sides of pan. 

Stir, but not often as it will make potatoes mushy.  Sprinkle cheddar cheese on top before serving.

Stir 2 times.

ingredientList:
1 pound hamburger
1 onion diced
2 tablespoons oils
1 cup chopped celery
4 tablespoons soy sauce
1 cup raw white rice
1 can cream of mushroom soup
1 can cream of celery soup
1 teaspoon salt
1 1/2 cups water
recipeText:
Brown hamburger and onions in oil.  

Add all ingredients into a roaster.  

Bake at 350 degrees for 1 to 1 1/2 hours.  

Stir often, add water if needed.

ingredientList:
12 ounces cooked egg noodles
3 tablespoons oils
1 pound ground beef
1 onion
2 cups sauerkraut
1 can cream of chicken soup
1/2 cup water
recipeText:
Brown the beef and onion in the oil. Salt to taste. Put into bottom of a casserole dish and spread the egg noodles over the top of the meat.
Arrange the sauerkraut on top. Top off with the soup and water mixture. 

Bake 1 hour at 350 degrees.

recipeName: St. Anne's Hamburger Hot Dish - very good
ingredientList:
2 pounds ground beef
1 cup diced celery
1/2 cup chopped onions
1 pound wide noodles
1 8-ounce can mushroom pieces
1 can cream of mushroom soup
1 can cream of celery soup
1 can cheddar cheese soup
1 tablespoon Natures Seasoning*
recipeText:
Brown beef.  Pre-cook celery and onion in water to cover, until barely tender.  Cook noodles for about 5 minutes and drain.  

Combine meat, celery with cooking liquids, mushrooms with liquid in can, and all soups and Natures Seasoning.  Mix thoroughly.  Add noodles and mix in.  

Put into Pam sprayed roaster pan.  Cover and refrigerate overnight or 6 - 8 hours to blend flavors. 

Bake at 300 degrees until heated through, approximately 1 - 2 hours.  Stir once or twice so it heats evenly.  Add a little water if mixture seems dry.

*Natures Seasoning can be found in the spice section of grocery stores.  It is made by Mortons Salt Co. and can be used in many dishes.

ingredientList:
1/2 cup onions
1/3 cup celery
1 pound ground beef
Dash salt
Dash pepper
1 can cream of mushroom soup  (or cream of celery soup)
16 ounces frozen tater tots
1 cup shredded cheddar cheese
recipeText:
Grease a 9" x 13" (2-quart) baking dish.  Brown onions, celery, and beef.  Drain off grease.  Spread mixture into the baking dish and sprinkle with salt and pepper.  

Pour can of soup over the mixture (an additional can is optional and makes the meal more juicy).  Top with frozen tater tots.

Bake at 400 degrees for 45 minutes, when mixture is bubbly.  Sprinkle with cheddar cheese and bake until cheese is melted.

ingredientList:
8 ounces uncooked corkscrew pasta
2 cups frozen mixed vegetables thawed
1 garlic clove minced
2 tablespoons margarine
1 can cream of mushroom soup
1 cup milk
1 1/2 cups shredded mozzarella cheese
1/8 teaspoon pepper
12 ounces can tuna
recipeText:
Cook pasta according to package. 

Saute vegetables and garlic in melted margarine until vegetables are crisp.

Stir in soup, milk, cheese and pepper.

Cook over medium heat stirring frequently until cheese us melted.

Stir in pasta and tuna, cook until heated.

ingredientList:
1/2 cup raw carrots, cut up
1/2 cup celery, cut fine
3 cups cooked turkey
1 can cream of mushroom soup
1 1/2 cups milk
1/2 package onion soup mix
1 can drained asparagus or peas
Cooked noodles
recipeText: Mix all ingredients except noodles.  Place noodles in a pan.  Pour mixture over noodles and bake until carrots and celery are soft.

ingredientList:
turkey, cooked and shredded
1 big block of Velveeta cheese
1 can cream of mushroom soup
1 stick butter
milk
recipeText:
Mix ingredients until cheese is melted and everything is hot.
Add water if the mixture is too sticky or thick.
Use your own judgment on how much of each to use.  

This is a great way to use leftover turkey to make a different meal.

recipeName: Cleans Sink, Shower and Bathtub Drains
recipeText:
Pour boiling Water down drain.
Add 1/2 cup baking powder.
Followed by 1/2 cup white vinegar.
Some people say you could add 1/4 cup of salt and that it helps.
Let this sit in the drain for some time.

recipeDescription: To make them bloom blue or pink you need a more acidic soil.
ingredientList:
vinegar
sugar
water
recipeText: Mix together.

ingredientList:
1/4 cup vinegar
3/4 cup vegetable oil

1 teaspoon Dawn dishwashing soap
3-4 tablespoons hydrogen peroxide
2 Tablespoons baking soda
Scrub on with scrub brush
recipeText: Scrub on with scrub brush.

ingredientList:
4 cups rhubarb Diced
4 cups sugar ( I use 2 Cups ) Lady said
1 small can crushed pineapple 14-oz
3 dozens cherry jello
recipeText:
COOK RHUBARB WITH SUGAR FOR 12 MINUTES. ADD PINEAPPLE AND COOK 3 MINUTES. ADD JELLO MIXING WELL AND POUR INTO BARS AND SEAL

Cook rhubarb with sugar for 12 minutes.  Add pineapple and cook 3 minutes.  Add jello and mix well.

Pour into jars and seal.

ingredientList:
3 cups sugar
3 cups water
1 6-ounce can orange juice concentrate
recipeText: Heat water and dissolve sugar.  Add orange juice and boil.  Set aside to cool.  Pour over fresh fruit and freeze.

ingredientList:
6 cups rhubarb cut up
5 cups sugar
1/2 pound or more oranges slices
recipeText:
Mix well and boil 20 minutes. 

Makes 8 jelly glasses.

ingredientList:
5 cups rhubarb cut small pieces
3 cups sugar
1/2 cup water
1 package red jello
recipeText:
Cover rhubarb with boiling water and let set. 
 
Drain well.  

Add sugar and 1/2 cup water.  

Boil 10 minutes.  

Add jello. 

Seal jars.

ingredientList:
6 cups cooked rhubarb
Sure Jell
4 cups sugar
1 can strawberry pie filling
1 small box jello
recipeText:
Mix Sure Jell with rhubarb.  Add sugar and let stand overnight.  

Boil rhubarb mixture for 20 minutes.  Add strawberry pie filling.  Boil for 5 minutes.  Add 1 small box of jello.

ingredientList:
7 cups cut up rhubarb
1 can strawberry pie mix
4 cups sugar
2 (3-ounce) boxes strawberry jello
recipeText:
Mix rhubarb, sugar and pie mix. Let stand for 15 minutes.

Boil for 10 to 15-+ minutes (I did 15 min.)

Add jello, stir until it's dissolved. 

Put in jars. Keep in refrigerator or freeze. 

Can substitute blueberry pie mix and blueberry jello.

It seems real sweet while hot, but once it was cool we really liked it.

ingredientList:
2 teaspoons butter
1 cup onions
1 1/2 cups diced celery
2 pounds ground beef
1 tablespoon mustard
1/2 cup water
1 teaspoon salt
1/2 teaspoon pepper
1 teaspoon chili powder
1 1/2 tablespoons vinegar
3 tablespoons sugar
1 bottle (small) ketchup
recipeText: Brown beef and drain grease.  Mix all ingredients together and simmer.

ingredientList:
Pork (spare ribs, chops, etc.)
1 cup chopped onions
2 tablespoons brown sugar
1/4 teaspoon chili powder
1 teaspoon salt
2 tablespoons Worcestershire sauce
1 cup tomato juice
1/2 cup water
1 tablespoon paprika
1 teaspoon dry mustard
1/8 teaspoon cayenne pepper
1/4 cup vinegar
1/4 cup catsup
recipeText:
Pour chopped onions over pork.  Cover and bake at 450 degrees for 30 minutes.  

Mix and simmer remaining ingredients for 15 minutes.

Pour sauce over meat.  Reduce oven heat to 350 degrees and cook for additional for 1 1/2 to 2 hours.  Continually baste meat with sauce.  Add water to keep pork from browning.  Keep pork covered.

ingredientList:
spare ribs
1 cup chopped onions
2 tablespoons brown sugar
1/4 teaspoon chili powder
1 teaspoon salt
2T tablespoon Worcestershire sauce
1 cup tomato juice
1/2 cup water
1 tablespoon paprika
1 teaspoon dry mustard
1/8 teaspoon cayenne pepper
1/4 cup vinegar
1/4 cup catsup
recipeText:
Place spare ribs in pan, cover with chopped onions.

Bake at 450 degrees for 30 minutes.

Mix the remainder ingredients and simmer sauce for 15 minutes.

When ribs are baked, take out of oven and pour sauce over ribs.  Cover with foil.

Turn heat down to 350 degrees and bake ribs for an additional 1 1/2 - 2 hours.

Periodically, baste with sauce and add water to keep ribs from browning.

ingredientList:
6 cups soft bread crumbs
1 1/2 cups milk
4 eggs
3 pounds ground beef (90% lean or better)
1 pound ground pork (Jimmy Dean's Hot Sausage works great)
2 finely chopped onions
2 tablespoons Worcestershire sauce
1 tablespoon salt
1/4 teaspoon pepper
1 cup ketchup
recipeText:
Soak bread in milk.  Add eggs and beat with rotary beater.  Add meat, onion, celery, Worcestershire sauce, salt, pepper, and 1/4 cup catsup.  

Form into 2 loaves for 8 servings, for 16 servings, 4 loaves .  Place in loaf pan or 13x9x2 inch baking pan.  

Bake, uncovered at 350 degrees for 1 hour. 

Spread the rest of the catsup over top of loaves and bake extra 15 minutes.

ingredientList:
Brisket in Marinade:
5 pounds whole brisket
3 ounces liquid smoke (Wright's)
garlic salt
onion powder
celery seed


Sauce:
4 tablespoons brown sugar
4 tablespoons white vinegar
4 teaspoons Worcestershire sauce
1 cup catsup
4 teaspoons dry mustard
1 teaspoon salt
dash cayenne pepper
10 drops tabasco
recipeText:
Prepare the brisket with marinade ingredients.  Cover and refrigerate overnight.

Bake covered at 275 degrees; 1 hour per pound of brisket.

Cool completely in refrigerator.

Slice or pull apart meat, keeping the juices in the pan. 

Mix the sauce ingredients and pour 1/2 over beef.  Reserve 1/2 to pass.


Bake uncovered at 300 degrees for 1 hour.

Serve on onion buns.

ingredientList:
1 tablespoon dried parsley
1 tablespoon dried chives
1/2 teaspoon garlic powder
6 boneless skinless chicken breast halves
1/2 teaspoon salt
1/2 teaspoon pepper
3 tablespoons butter, cut into 6 equal slices
1 tablespoon seasoned bread crumbs, divided
1/8 teaspoon paprika
recipeText:
Preheat the oven to 350 degrees.  

In a small bowl, combine the parsley, chives, and garlic powder; set aside.  

Between 2 pieces of waxed paper, gently pound the chicken to 1/4-inch thickness with a mallet or rolling pin.  

Sprinkle both sides of each breast lightly with salt and pepper, then sprinkle 1 teaspoon of the parsley mixture on one side of each chicken piece.  

Place a slice of butter in the center of each piece of chicken and roll each chicken breast tightly, tucking in the sides as you roll.  

Place the rolls seam side down in medium-sized muffin tins that have been coated with nonstick vegetable spray; sprinkle 1/2 teaspoon of the seasoned bread crumbs and some paprika over each roll.  

Bake for 25 - 30 minutes until no pink remains and juices run clear.  Serve immediately.

ingredientList:
1/2 of a chicken or 1 pound of hamburger
6 tablespoons soy sauce
1 cup water
1 large bunch of celery, cut in 1/2 inch pieces
1 small onion, chopped
2 tablespoons cornstarch
1/4 cup water
1 10 1/2-ounce can water chestnuts, drained & sliced
2 1/2 cups bean sprouts, drained
2 ounces can mushrooms
Dash salt
Dash pepper
1 can chow main mixed vegetables
1 bag chow main noodles
recipeText:
Brown meat in oil or meat fat.  Add soy sauce and 1 cup of water.  Simmer 2 minutes.

Add celery and onion.  Simmer 1.5 hours.  

Blend corn starch and 1/4 cup water; stir into meat mixture.  Add chestnuts, bean sprouts, veggies, and mushrooms.  

Heat through, season and serve over chow main noodles, or cool and freeze.

ingredientList:
2 pounds chicken tenders or 4 Large chicken breasts
2 Sleeves Ritz crackers
1/8 teaspoon pepper
1/2 cup milk
3 cups shredded Cheddar cheese
1 Tablespoon dried parsley

SAUCE:
10 OZ Can cream of chicken soup
2 Tablespoon sour cream
2 tablespoons butter
recipeText:
If using chicken breasts cut breasts into tender sized pieces. Crush crackers and toss with salt and pepper.

Pour milk, cheese, and crackers crumbs into 3 separate small pans.

Dip each piece of chicken into the milk and then the cheese; press the cheese into the chicken with you fingers. Then press the cheesy coated chicken into the cracker crumbs and press it in.

Spray a 9x13 pan with cooking spray and lay the chicken in the pan.

Sprinkle the dried parsley over the chicken.

Cover with tin foil.

Bake at 400 degrees for 35 minutes. 

Remove tin foil, bake additional 10-15 minutes or until the edges of the chicken are golden brown and crispy.

In a medium sized sauce pan combine the cream of chicken soup, sour cream, and butter with a whisk. Stir it over a medium high heat until the sauce is nice and hot. Serve over the chicken.

ingredientList:
Ham balls:
2 grounds smoked ham
2 cups crackers crumbs
2 eggs
1 pound ground lean pork
1 cup milk

Glaze:
1/2 cup vinegar,
1 cup brown sugar
2 teaspoon horse radish
1/2 cup water
1 tsp. prepared mustard
recipeText:
Mix and shape into balls.  Arrange in single layer in baking pan.

Bake for 45 minutes at 350 degrees.

Make glaze.  Baste occasionally.

ingredientList:
3 tablespoons fresh lime juice
1 tablespoon olive oil
1 tablespoon chopped fresh tarragon or thyme, divided
1/2 teaspoon grated lemon peels
1/2 teaspoon salt
1/2 teaspoon pepper
1 1/4 pounds beef tenderloin filets, cut 1 inch thick.
1/3 cup sour cream
1 teaspoon Dijon style mustard
recipeText:
In a resealable plastic bag, combine lemon juice, olive oil, 2 teaspoons of the tarragon, lemon peel, salt, and pepper; add steaks.  Turn to coat well; seal bag and chill 2 to 24 hours, turning occasionally.

Meanwhile, for sauce, in a small bowl stir together sour cream, mustard, and remaining 1 teaspoon tarragon.  Cover and chill until serving time.

Preheat grill to medium.  Remove steak from marinade; discard marinade.  Grill 8 - 12 minutes for medium rare, or 12 - 15 minutes for medium.

Serve with sauce.  Garnish with additional fresh tarragon, if desired.

ingredientList:
1 1/2 pounds ground beef
1 1/2 ground pork
1 package lipton soup
2 eggs
1/2 cup milk
1 cup bread crumbs
1/2 cup ketchup
recipeText: Mix all together and bake in a bread pan.

ingredientList:
1/4 cup onion, browned
1 pound hamburger meat
1 can tomato soup 
1/2 cup shredded cheese cheddar
1/4 to 1/2 tsp. oregano
dash of pepper
24 slices mozzarella cheese (or shredded)
small buns or English Muffins
recipeText:
Simmer onions, hamburger meat, tomato soup, shredded cheddar cheese, oregano, and pepper in a pan for 10 minutes, until meat is cooked through.  
*Can also add 1 can small mushrooms.

Spread mixture on buns.  Place a slice of mozzarella or shredded mozzarella cheese on top of meat mixture.  Put under broiler until brown.

*These can be made up ahead of time and frozen on a cookie sheet.  Be sure they heat all the way through.  Bake 325 to 350 degrees until cheese is browned, not under broiler.

Makes about 24 pizza burgers.

ingredientList:
3 pounds pork boned loin of pork roast all chops
3 1/2 cups sauerkraut
2 cups water
2 raw potatoes pealed and grated

Dumplings:
4 potatoes peaeled
1 egg
dash salt
1 to 2 slices bread crumbs
1/4 teaspoon salt
1/2 cup flour
recipeText:
Put pork in heavy kettle. Add sauerkraut. Add 2 cups water, cover and simmer for 2 1/2 hours, or until meat is tender. 

Add additional water if necessary

Add grated raw potatoes to thicken. Cook on low an additional 7 to 12 minutes.

ingredientList:
3 medium potatoes, thinly sliced
2 large carrots, thinly sliced
1 onion, sliced
1 teaspoon salt
1/2 teaspoon pepper
4 pounds beef rump roast
1/2 cup water
2 packages onion soup mix, dry
recipeText:
Put vegetables in the bottom of the crock-pot.  Salt and pepper meat, then put in pot.  Sprinkle on onion soup mix.  Add liquid.  

Cover, cook on low 10 - 12 hours (high 5-6 hours).

recipeName: Salad Bar Vegetable Beef Stir-Fry - Michelle Bertrang
ingredientList:
1/3 cup water
1 tablespoon cornstarch
2 tablespoons soy sauce
2 tablespoons honey
1/2 teaspoon ginger
1/4 teaspoon salt
1/8 teaspoon cinnamon
2 tablespoons oil
3/4 pound boneless beef sirloin steaks, slightly frozen, cut into paper-thin strips about 2" x 1"
2 cloves garlic,minced
1 1/2 pounds assorted, cut-up fresh vegetables
recipeText:
In a small bowl, blend water, cornstarch, soy sauce, honey, ginger, salt, and cinnamon; set aside.  

Heat a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat until hot.  Add 1 tablespoon of oil; heat until it ripples.  Add beef and garlic.  Cook and stir 3 to 4 minutes or until browned.  Remove and reserve beef and any liquid in skillet.

In the same skillet, over medium heat, heat remaining 1 tablespoon oil until it ripples.  Add firm vegetables (broccoli, carrots, cauliflower); cook and stir 2 minutes or until vegetables are slightly limp.  

Add less firm vegetables (onions, green or red bell peppers); cook and stir 2 - 3 minutes.  Add soft vegetables (mushrooms, bean sprouts, pea pods), cook and stir 1 - 2 minutes or until all vegetables are crisp-tender.  

Return beef and any liquid to skillet; stir in sauce mixture.  Cook and stir until sauce is bubble and thickened.  If using tomatoes, stir and heat until warm.  Serve with hot cooked rice or Chinese noodles, if desired.

ingredientList:
2 pounds chicken
1/4 cup brown sugar
1/2 cup soy sauce
2 tablespoons cider vinegar
1/2 teaspoon ginger
1 clove garlic
1/8 teaspoon pepper
7 cups water
1/2 cup baking soda
1/3 cup lemon juice
1/4 cup vinegar

4 pounds ground beef
1 pound pork sausages 
4 cups bread crumbs
3 eggs
3 cups milk
3/4 cup minced onions
3/4 teaspoon ginger
3/4 teaspoon nutmeg
3/4 teaspoon pepper
2 tablespoons salt
recipeText:
Mix all ingredients together and cook in frying pan.  Use extra milk in the pan as needed to prevent burning.

To make the gravy, add extra milk and flour to the pan grease.  Stir until thick and pour over meatballs.  Add extra ginger, nutmeg, and pepper as needed.

ingredientList:
3-3 1/2 cups flour (2 for recipe)
1 package rapid yeast
1 cup very warm water (125 to 130 degrees)
2 tablespoons oils
3/4 teaspoon salt
recipeText:
Mix 2 cups flour, yeast, salt, and oil. 

Stir in water. Stir in more flour, enough to make the dough soft.

Knead for 4 to 6 minutes on flour board. Divide into 2 balls.

Makes two 12-inch pizzas.

ingredientList:
1/4 brown sugar
1/4 dark corn syrup
2 tablespoons butter or margarine
1/2 teaspoon salt
3 cups Kix cereal
1 cup walnuts
ice cream
recipeText:
Heat oven to 325 degrees. Butter a cookie sheet pan or jelly roll pan. 

Heat brown sugar, corn syrup, butter, and salt in a saucepan over medium heat; stirring constantly until sugar is dissolved, about 5 minutes.

Remove from heat; stir in cereal and walnuts until well coated. 

Spread mixture evenly in pan. 

Bake uncovered 15 minutes. 

Cool 10 minutes, then loosen mixture let stand until firm, about 30 minutes. 

Break apart. Serve over ice cream.

Store in airtight container. 

*Makes about 6 cups.

ingredientList:
3 egg yolk
1 whole egg
3 Tablespoons cold water
1 teaspoon salt
2 cups flour
recipeText:
Beat egg and egg yolks until very light.

Beat in 3 Tablespoons cold water.

Mix in salt and flour.  

Leave stand over night.

Work with hands. Divide in 3 parts and roll until very thin.

ingredientList:
1 cup ketchup
1 1/2 cups mozola oil
3/4 cup sugar
1/4 cup vinegar
1 teaspoon paprika
1 teaspoon celery salt
1 teaspoon grated onions
1 teaspoon salt
1 teaspoon pepper
1 tablespoon Worcestershire sauce
Juice of one lemon
1 clove garlic
recipeText: Mix all ingredients in mixer for 15 minutes.  Drop a clove of garlic in bottom of jar when you pour dressing into the jar.  Store in the refrigerator.

ingredientList:
3 cups cooked white rice
3 tablespoons sesame oil
1 cup frozen peas and carrots thawed
1 small onion chopped
1 teaspoon minced garlic
2 eggs slightly beaten
1/4 cup soy sauce
shrimp or chicken (optional)
recipeText:
On medium high heat, heat the oil in a large skillet or wok. 

Add the peas, carrots, onion, and garlic. Stir fry until tender. 

Lower the heat to medium low and push to one side of skillet.

Add egg and stir fry until scrambled,

Add the rice and soy sauce, blend all together well. Stir fry until thoroughly heated. 

*Can add green onion.

*Add shrimp or chicken for a complete meal

ingredientList:
2 pounds chunk frozen hash brown potatoes
1 can cream of chicken soup
3/4 cup chopped onions
1 stick melted butter or margarine
8 ounces shredded Cheddar cheese
1 teaspoon salt
1 teaspoon garlic salt
1 cup sour cream
2 cups crushed corn flakes
recipeText:
Mix hash browns, soup, onion, 1/2 stick melted margarine, salts, and sour cream together, put in baking dish.

Mix 1/2 stick melted margarine & corn flakes, and place over the top of potato mixture.

Bake at 350° for 1 1/2 hours.

ingredientList:
4 4-serving boxes jello or 2 large 8-serving size
2 1/2 cups boiling water
recipeText:
Completely dissolve gelatin in boiling water . Pour into 13 x9 inch pan. 

Chill until firm; about 3 hours.  

Dip pan in warm water approximately 15 seconds. Cut into squares or use cookie cutter. Lift shapes form pan.

ingredientList:
4 cups mashed potatoes
1/4 cup crisco
1/4 cup butter
1/2 cup cream
1 tablespoon sugar
1 teaspoon salt (or slightly more)
3 cups flour
recipeText:
Mix all ingredients except flour.  Let it sit overnight.

Cool throughly.  Then add the flour.  Roll out dough and fry at 450 degrees to 500 degrees.

recipeName: Lefse - altered to include potato ingredients
ingredientList:
2-2/3 cups instant Idahoan potatoes flakes
2-2/3 cups water
1 cup milk
1/4 cup crisco
6 tablespoons butter
1/2 cup cream
1 tablespoon sugar
1-1/2 teaspoons salt (or slightly more)
3 cups flour
recipeText:
Mix all ingredients except flour.  Let it sit overnight.

Cool throughly.  Then add the flour.  Roll out dough and fry at 450 degrees to 500 degrees.

ingredientList:
1 large onion thinly sliced
1 cup flour
1 1/2 teaspoons salt
1/2 teaspoon white peppers
1 cup vegetable oil
recipeText:
Separate the onion slices into rings. 

In a medium bowl, combine the flour, salt, and pepper. Mix well.

In a large skillet, heat the oil over medium high heat. 

Place the onion rings in mixture and coat well then carefully place in the hot oil.

Fry for 6 to 8 minutes until golden. Drain on a paper towel-lined plate and serve. Can sprinkle with salt.

ingredientList:
2 eggs
1 cup milk
1 cup flour
1/4 teaspoon salt
recipeText:
Generously grease six 6-ounce custard cups or 8 muffin cups.  Set aside.

In large mixing bowl beat eggs.  Add remaining ingredients and beat on low speed just until smooth.  Fill cups about 3/4 full with batter.

Bake at 400 degrees for 15 minutes, then reduce to 325 degrees and bake for 15 minutes longer, or until deep golden brown.

Remove from pan and serve warm.

ingredientList:
1 package kool-aid
1 package jello Same Flavor
1 cup sugar or less sugar (We preferred less sugar)
2 cups hot water
3 cup cold water
recipeText: Dissolve kool-aid, jello, and sugar in hot water.  Add cold water. Freeze.

ingredientList:
1 pkg jello
1 pkg koolaid any flavor
1 cup sugar
2 cups Hot water
2 cups cold water
recipeText:
Dissolve above ingredients in 2 cups hot water.

Add 2 cups cold water. Mix well.

Pour into popsicle containers. Freeze.

*I preferred less sugar

ingredientList:
1 egg
2 tablespoons sugar
1 teaspoon salt
2 tablespoons oils
ADD
3/4 cup milk
3/4 cup flour
1 1/2 teaspoons baking powder
1/3 cup corn meal

1 package instant chocolate pudding
3 1/2 cups milk
1/4 cup sugar
recipeText: Mix together and freeze in mold or cold drink cups. Use plastic spoons or wooden sticks.

ingredientList:
1 8-ounce can tomato sauce
2 teaspoons dried oregano or basil
1 clove minced garlic
recipeText: Mix all ingredients together.  Makes 1 1/2 cup.

ingredientList:
1 cup dates (cut fine)
1 cup chopped nuts
1 can Eagle Brand Milk
1 box Ritz crackers
1 stick butter
2 cups powdered sugar
1 teaspoon vanilla extract
Milk
recipeText:
Put dates and milk in a double boiler.  Cook about 8 - 10 minutes or until mixture thickens.  Take off heat and add nuts.  Cover each Ritz cracker with mixture.  

Bake at 300 degrees for 5 - 10 minutes.  Cool.  

Mix butter and powdered sugar, and enough milk to make spreading easy.  Frost crackers.

Makes 5 dozen.

ingredientList:
2 eggs
1 teaspoon sugar
1/4 teaspoon salt
1 cup milk
1 cup flour
Frosting:
3 cups sifted powdered sugar
2/3 cup shortening Crisco
2 1/2 tablespoons water
1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract
recipeText:
Use a fork to beat eggs, sugar, and salt.  Don't beat too much or they will have too much air in them.  Add flour.  Then slowly add milk while keeping bumps out of the batter.  

Heat lard to 350 degrees to 360 degrees; put rosette iron into lard and heat.  Dip iron into batter, then into lard for frying.  Fry about one minute.  

Mix frosting ingredients and frost rosettes.

recipeDescription: From Alice Lendt.  These are so yummy, a child favorite!
ingredientList:
4 - 6 apples
1 1/2 cups water
2 cups sugar
1/2 cup vinegar
6 whole cloves
1 - 2 sticks cinnamon
Red food coloring
recipeText:
Wash, peel, and core apples.  Slice them 1/2 inch thick.

Make a syrup of the sugar, water, and vinegar.  Tied cloves and cinnamon in a bag.  Cook the apples and spices in the syrup, turning often until the fruit is clear.

Remove the apples and spice bag from the mixture.

Add red food coloring to the syrup.  Pour the syrup over the apples.  Cool.  Makes 12 - 16 rings.

ingredientList:
Pumpkin Seeds
butter
olive oil
sea salt
recipeText:
Preheat oven to 250 degrees.

In a large bowl, combine pumpkin seeds with melted butter and olive oil, stirring to coat seeds evenly. 

Add sea salt, toss.

Spread the seeds on a sheet pan.

Roast about 1 hour.

ingredientList:
2 1/2 cups lightly toasted coconut
1/3 cup margarine
3 ounces cream cheese, softened
14 ounces sweetened condensed milk
2 1/2 cups strawberries, mashed or pureed (about 1 1/2 cups)
3 tablespoons lemon juice
1/2 pint heavy cream, whipped
recipeText:
In a large saucepan, melt margarine; stir in toasted coconut.  Mix well.  Press into the bottom and up sides of 9-inch pie pan; chill.  In large bowl, beat cheese until fluffy, beat in condensed milk.  Sir in pureed strawberries and lemon juice.  Fold in whipped cream.  

Pour into coconut crust (mixture should move slightly).  Freeze 4 hours or until form.  

Before serving, garnish with additional fresh strawberries.

ingredientList:
1/2 pound marshmallows
1/4 cup milk
1/4 teaspoon salt
1/4 cup green creme de menthe
2 tablespoons white crème de cacao
1 cup whipped cream
pie crust (baked pie crust, graham cracker crust, or chocolate sandwich crust)
maraschino cherries
recipeText:
Heat marshmallows, milk, and salt over hot water until marshmallows melt.

Add green creme de menthe and white crème de cacao.  Cool completely. 

Fold in whipped cream.

Pour into pie shell and refrigerate until ready to eat.

Garnish with maraschino cherries.

recipeDescription:
Preparation Time: 8 minutes 
Total Time: 8 minutes
ingredientList:
1 (3 1/2-ounce) package strawberry jello (4-serving size)
2/3 cup boiling water
2 cups ice cubes
1 (8-ounce) container non-dairy frozen whipped topping, thawed
1 cup sliced fresh strawberries
1 graham cracker pie crust
recipeText:
1. In small bowl dissolve gelatin in boiling water. Add ice. Stir for 2 to 3 minutes or until gelatin thickens. Remove and discard unmelted ice.

2. Whisk in whipped topping. Fold in strawberries. Refrigerate, if necessary, until mixture mounds when spooned.

3. Spoon into crust. Refrigerate at least 2 hours or until set. Garnish as desired. Store in refrigerator.

Alternative fruits:
1 cup diced orange sections, banana, or fresh peaches.
1 can 8-3/4 ounces apricots, sliced peaches, or pear halves, drained and diced.

ingredientList:
1 cup flour
1/8 teaspoon salt
1/2 cup Crisco shortening
3 tablespoons water
1/4 cup butter or margarine, softened
1 cup sugar
4 eggs
3/4 cup light corn syrup
2 teaspoons vanilla extract
1 1/4 cups pecan halves
recipeText:
For Crust:  Combine flour and salt.  Cut in Crisco with pastry blender or knife until flour is just blended into form of pea-size chunks.  Add all water.  Toss lightly with fork until dough forms a ball.  

Press between hands to form 5" to 6" pancake.  Flour rolling surface and pin lightly.  Roll dough into circle and trim 1" larger than upside-down 9" pie plate.  

Loosen dough carefully.  Fold into quarters.  Unfold and press into pie plate.  Fold edge under and flute as desired.  

For Filling:  Cream butter and sugar in a mixing bowl.  Beat in eggs, syrup, and vanilla.  Stir in pecans.  Pour filling into unbaked pie shell.  

Bake at 375 degrees for 5 minutes.  Reduce heat to 325 degrees.  Bake for 45 minutes or until knife inserted in center comes out clean.  

Cool to room temperature before cutting.  Makes one 9" pie.

ingredientList:
1 cup flour
1/2 teaspoon salt
1/3 cup shortening
1 tablespoon shortening
2 tablespoons water
recipeText: Sift flour and salt together.  Using a fork, cut in shortening.  For a flaky crust, do not over mix.  Overmixing causes the crust to be thick and dough-like.  Mix in water until mixture is slightly wet.  Roll out crust and press into pie pan.

ingredientList:
2 cups water
1 1/2 cups sugar
1/3 cup cornstarch
1/2 cup corn syrup
Red food coloring
1 package raspberry jello
2 cups or more of raspberries
1 baked pie shell
Cool whip
recipeText:
Mix water, sugar, cornstarch, corn syrup, and food coloring and bring to a boil.  Add jello and cook for 4 minutes.  Let cool slightly.

Add raspberries and pour into a baked pie shell.  Chill.

Top with whipped cream or cool whip.

ingredientList:
1 cup Original Bisquick
1/4 cup butter
3 tablespoons hot water
1 cup fresh strawberries
2/3 cup water
1 cup sugar
3 tablespoons cornstarch
1/3 cup water
3 cups whole strawberries
recipeText:
Make a pie crust by mixing Bisquick with butter and 3 tablespoons hot water.  Pat into a pie pan and bake at 350 degrees for 8 - 10 minutes.  Cool completely.

Glaze:  For 3 minutes, simmer 1 cup of fresh strawberries with 2/3 cup of water.   Then combine 1 cup sugar, cornstarch, and 1/3 cup water and bring all to a good boil.  

Put 3 cups of strawberries in the cooled crust.  Pour glaze mixture over the strawberries.

Chill several hours.

ingredientList:
1 cup butter
2 cups Brown sugar
1/2 cup Karo salt
1/2 cup Karo corn syrup Green Label
2 cups brown sugar
1 cup butter
1 teaspoon salt
1/2 teaspoon baking soda
1 teaspoon vanilla extract
6 quarts popped corn
recipeText:
Melt Butter. Stir in Brown Sugar, Syrup and Salt. Bring to a boil-Stirring constantly. Boil without stirring 5 minutes. Remove from heat. 

Stir in Soda and vanilla. Pour over popped corn. Mix well. 

Put in 2 or 3 shallow baking pans.(I use glass Pans) 

Bake at 250 degrees for 1 hour. Stir every 15 minutes. Cool and remove from pan.

ingredientList:
2 bags popcorn
1 cup margarine
2 cups brown sugar
1/2 cup corn syrup
1/2 teaspoon baking soda
recipeText:
Mix margarine, brown sugar, and karo corn syrup. Boil and simmer for 5 minutes.
Take of stove and add baking soda and stir. 

Put popcorn into two cake pans. Pour the caramel syrup mixture over the popcorn and stir.

Bake in oven at 250 degrees.  Stir every 15 minutes.

ingredientList:
1 1/3 cups sugar
1 cup butter
1/2 cup white syrup
2 teaspoons vanilla extract
4 quarts popcorn
recipeText: Boil sugar, butter, and syrup at low heat for 10 minutes.  Add vanilla.  Pour over popcorn.

ingredientList:
1 cup butter
2 cups brown sugar
1/2 cup Karo corn syrup
1 teaspoon salt
1/2 teaspoon baking soda
1 teaspoon vanilla extract
6 quarts popped popcorn
recipeText:
Melt Butter. Stir in brown sugar, syrup and salt. Bring to a boil, stirring constantly. Boil without stirring 5 minutes. Remove from heat. 

Stir in soda and vanilla. Pour over popped corn. Mix well. Put in 2 or 3 shallow baking Pans. (I Use Glass Pans) Bake at 250 degrees for 1 hour. Stir every 15 minutes. Cool and remove from pans.

ingredientList:
1 cup butter
1 cup brown sugar
1/2 cup light corn syrup
2 teaspoons vanilla extract
1 teaspoon baking soda
1 bag Chester's Puffcorn
recipeText:
Pour puffcorn into a baking pan or oven safe dish.

In a 2 quart saucepan, cook together butter, brown sugar, light born syrup and vanilla for 2 minutes.  Add baking soda to mixture, which will cause caramel mixture to foam.

Pour caramel mixture over Chester's puffcorn (in baking pan) and stir until mixed.

Place in 200 degree oven for 45 minutes. Stir every 10-15 minutes.

Remove from oven and place on wax paper to break apart.

ingredientList:
1 cup brown sugar
1 stick butter or margarine
1/4 cup white corn syrup
1/2 tablespoon salt
1/2 tablespoon baking soda
5 TO 6 quart popped corn
recipeText:
Combine all ingredients except soda and popcorn in 1 1/2 to 2 quart dish.  Bring to a boil, then cook on full power 2 minutes.

Remove from microwave and stir in soda.

Put popped corn in brown paper grocery bag. Pour syrup over corn. Close bag and shake. 

Cook in bag on high in microwave 1 1/2 minutes.  May need another 1 1/2 minutes.

Pour into a pan and allow to cool.

ingredientList:
3 cups white corn syrup
3 tablespoons vinegar
1 teaspoon salt
1 teaspoon vanilla extract
3 quarts popped corn
recipeText:
Boil all ingredients except popped corn until mixture forms a hard ball when dropped from spoon into cold water.

Pour over popped corn and form into 3" balls.

ingredientList:
4 quarts popcorn (16 cups)
1 bag or jar dry roasted peanuts
1 small bag spiced gum Drops
1/2 cup oil
1/2 cup butter
1 pound marshmallows
recipeText:
In a Kettle, Melt the oil, butter, and marshmallows. 

Pour over the popped corn, nuts, and gum drops. 

Press into an angel food pan (pre-sprayed with Pam). 

Unmold when cooled.

ingredientList:
4 quarts popcorn (16 cups)
2 cups mixed nuts
3/4 cup red & green gum drops
1 1/2 cups margarine
2 10 1/2-ounce bags marshmallows
1 teaspoon vanilla extract
recipeText:
In a kettle, melt the butter and marshmallows.  Add the vanilla.  Pour over the popped corn, nuts and gumdrops.  Mix well.  

Press into an angel food tin (pre-sprayed with Pam).  

Refrigerate 24 hours before taking out of pan.

ingredientList:
2 cups mayonnaise
1 cup sugar
1 can water chestnuts, diced
1 bunch green onion
1 cup shredded Cheddar cheese
10 slices bacon, fried and crumbled
2 bags microwave popcorn
recipeText:
Mix all ingredients except popcorn. The mixture may be made the day before. Just before serving, add the popcorn.

Note: can use an 8 oz bag of popped corn.

recipeDescription: Found this recipe in the paper.
ingredientList:
1 bag marshmallows
8 cups popped popcorn
1/2 cup oils
1/2 cup butter
3/4 pound M M candy
2 handful spanish peanuts
recipeText:
Melt marshmallows, oil and butter. Add popcorn and mix well. Add peanuts and M &M's press lightly into a bundt pan or angel food cake pan (ungreased).

Leave set for several hours to cool, turn out onto a plate.

Serve and joy.

recipeDescription: Prep Time 10 Minutes. Total time 30 minutes.
ingredientList:
1 bag creamy mashed potatoes
1 tablespoon butter
1 egg
1 cup fine shredded Cheddar cheese
salt
pepper
1/2 tablespoon minced chives
recipeText:
Preheat oven to 375 degrees.

Mix together mashed potatoes, butter, egg, cheese, salt, pepper, and chives.

Pipe potato mix into mounds on a greased cookie sheet.

Bake in middle rack for 20-25 minutes or until edges are evenly brown.

ingredientList:
2 pounds frozen cubed Hash browns
1/2 cup butter
1 cup cream soup
1 cup sour cream
1 cup milk
8 ounces shredded cheese
1 tsp salt
1/2 teaspoon pepper
recipeText: Mix and bake at 350 degrees for 1 to 1 1/2 hours.

ingredientList:
Hash Browns:
1 package frozen shredded hash brown potatoes
1 can cream of chicken soup
2 cups Cheddar cheese shredded
1/4 cup butter melted
3/4 cup sour cream
1/4 cup chopped onions

Toppings:
1 1/2 cup corn flake crumbs
2 tablespoons butter
recipeText:
Heat oven to 350 degrees. 

Spray 2 quart glass baking dish with nonstick cooking spray. 

In large bowl combine all hash brown ingredients.  Mix well. Spread into prepared baking dish.

Stir together topping ingredients.  Spread topping over hash browns.

Bake 45 minutes or until hash browns are tender.

ingredientList:
6 cups mashed potatoes hashed
12 sliced bacon, cooked and crumbled
2 cups shredded cheddar cheese
2 cups French-fried onions
recipeText:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees.

Layer half of the potatoes in an 8 inch square baking dish.

Sprinkle with half of the bacon, 1 cup cheese, and 1 cup of French onions.  Top with the remaining potatoes.

Bake for 20 minutes or until hot.  Top with remaining bacon bits, cheese, and French fried onions.

Bake 5 minutes or until cheese is melted.

recipeName: Deluxe Hash Browns - Anna Joramo and Country Club
ingredientList:
1 can cream of potato soup
1 cup cream of celery soup
1 16-ounce carton sour cream
salt
pepper
onion to taste
1 package frozen hash brown potatoes
1 1/2 cups crushed corn flakes
1/2 cup melted butter
paprika
parsley flakes

Country Club also added:
1 can cheddar cheese soup 
1/2 green pepper
recipeText:
Mix in large bowl, soups, sour cream, salt, pepper, and onion.  Add THAWED hash brown potatoes. Put in 9 x13 pan or casserole. 

Mix crushed corn flakes with melted butter, parsley and paprika.

Bake uncovered at 300 degrees for 1/2 to 2 hours. 

Serves 12

*If O'Brian Hash Browns it already has peppers and onions in it.

ingredientList:
2 1/2 pounds potatoes about 7
4 garlic cloves
1 package Philadelphia cream cheese, softened
1 tablespoon butter
1 teaspoon salt
recipeText:
Cook potatoes and garlic in boiling water in large covered saucepan 20 min or until potatoes are tender.  Drain water.

Add remaining ingredients. Mash as desired.

ingredientList:
2 pounds chunk frozen hash brown potatoes
1 can cream of chicken soup
3/4 cup chopped onions
1 stick melted butter or margarine
8 ounces shredded cheddar cheese
1 teaspoon salt
1 teaspoon garlic salt
1 cup sour cream
2 cups crushed corn flakes
recipeText:
Mix hash browns, soup, onion, 1/2 stick melted margarine, salts, cheddar cheese, and sour cream together, put in baking dish.

Mix 1/2 stick melted margarine & corn flakes, and place over the top of potato mixture.

Bake at 350 degrees for 1 1/2 hours.

ingredientList:
2 pounds red potatoes, sliced 1/2 inch thick
1/3 cup vegetable oil
1 envelope onion soup mix
recipeText:
Combine all ingredients in a large plastic bag; shake until well coated. Empty bag into an ungreased 13-in. x 9-in. x 2-in. baking pan. 

Cover and bake at 350 degrees for 35 minutes, stirring occasionally. Uncover and bake 15 minutes longer or until potatoes are tender.  Can garnish with chopped parsley if desired.

ingredientList:
2 pounds frozen hash brown potatoes
1 cup chopped onions
1 teaspoon salt
1/4 teaspoon pepper
1/2 cup melted butter or margarine
1 pint sour cream
1 large can cheese whiz
1 can cream of chicken soup
2 cups crushed corn flakes
recipeText:
Mix hash browns, onions, salt, and 1/4 cup margarine.  

Mix sour cream, cheese, and soup. Heat until mixed well.  Pour over potatoes.

Mix 1/4 cup margarine & corn flakes, and sprinkle over the top of potato mixture.

Bake at 350 degrees for 45 minutes.

ingredientList:
2 pounds frozen hash brown potatoes
1 can potato soup
1 can cream of celery soup
8 ounces sour cream
Chopped onion greens
Dash parsley flakes
1 cup grated cheddar cheese
recipeText:
Put hash browns in bowl and break up.  Let stand and thaw 1 hour or more.  Add soups and sour cream and mix well.

Place in a 9" x 13" pan.  Sprinkle with parsley and cheese.  

Bake at 300 degrees for 1 1/2 hours or until brown on sides of pan.

ingredientList:
2 pounds frozen hash brown potatoes
1 can cream of celery soup
1 cup cream of mushroom soup
8 ounces sour cream and chives
recipeText:
Mix all ingredients except cheese in layers.  

Bake at 300 degrees for 2 to 4 hours or until brown on sides of pan.  Stir two times (not more often as it will make the potatoes mushy).  Sprinkle cheddar cheese on top before serving.

ingredientList:
4 large potatoes
1/4 cup butter
2/3 cup milk
2 tablespoons chopped onions
1/2 teaspoon salt
1/8 teaspoon ground black pepper
3/4 cup ground pepper
cheddar cheese
paprika
recipeText:
Cut hot baked potatoes in half. Scoop out insides, reserve shells.

With electric mixer, beat potatoes until creamy.

Gradually beat milk, stir in onion, salt, and pepper. Spoon mixture into reserved shells. Sprinkle with cheese. 

Arrange in baking dish. 

Bake at 375 F for 20 to 25 minutes or until heated through. 

Sprinkle with Paprika and serve.

ingredientList:
2 cans 14 1/2 ounce chicken broth
5 potatoes (7 1/2 cups)
1/2 cup light cream
2 teaspoons butter
dash black pepper
bacon bits (optional)
recipeText:
Heat broth and potatoes in a large saucepan medium high heat to a boil.

Reduce the heat to medium. Cover and cook for 10 minutes or until potatoes are tender. Drain reserving the broth.

Mash potatoes with 1/4 cup broth, cream, butter and black pepper.

Add additional broth if needed until desired consistency.

Add bacon if desired.

ingredientList:
1 can (4.5 ounce) chunk chicken breast, drained
1/4 cup chopped celery
1 tablespoon finely chopped onions
3 tablespoons mayonnaise
dash of pepper
recipeText:
Mix all ingredients, serve on bread with lettuce and tomato.

*Can also add chopped apple, chopped nuts, dijon mustard, or curry powder.

ingredientList:
1/4 cup butter
1/2 teaspoon garlic salt
1/2 teaspoon Italian seasoning
6 slices sharp Cheddar cheese
12 slices cooked ham
6 slices provalone cheese
12 king Hawaiian buns
recipeText: Heat oven to 350. Cover with tin foil and bake 15 min.  Uncovered bake 5 minutes.

ingredientList:
First Layer: 
6-ounce box lime jello
2 1/2 cups water

Second Layer:
8-ounce package cream cheese, softened
3-ounce box lemon jello
1 1/2 cups water
20 large marshmallows (or 3 cups mini-marshmallows)
1/2 cup orange juice (can use pineapple juice)

Third Layer:
6-ounce box cherry jello (can use raspberry or cranberry)

Topping:
cool whip
recipeText:
Spray a 9x13 inch pan with Pam. 

First Layer:
Dissolve lime jello in 2 1/2 cups hot water.  Cool in refrigerator until completely firm.


Second Layer:
Whip the cream cheese until light and fluffy, scraping bowl often; set aside.

Dissolve the lemon gelatin in 1 1/2 cups hot water and set aside.

In a saucepan, place the marshmallows and orange juice over medium heat and stir constantly until marshmallows melt and mixture is smooth. 

Pour the lemon gelatin mixture into the hot marshmallow mixture, stir.  Then add to the whipped cream cheese. Blend together until very smooth, scraping bowl and beater often. 

Set aside and let cool completely (about 30 minutes) then carefully pour over refrigerated and set lime layer.

Refrigerate until completely set before adding next layer.


Third Layer:
Dissolve cherry jello in 2 1/2 cups hot water and stir to dissolve. Let cool completely (about 30 minutes) before carefully and slowly pouring over cream cheese layer.

Chill until firm.

Cut into desired size squares to serve, usually 2 to 3 inch squares.

Top with cool whip.

*Salad can be made a day or two ahead of time.

ingredientList:
Salad:
1 package 7-ounce ring macaroni
1 cup crushed pineapple, drained
4 unpeeled apples

Fruit Dressing:
1 cup sugar
1/3 cup lemon juice
4 eggs
2 teaspoons flour

Topping:
1 pint whipping cream
recipeText:
Prepare the macaroni: Cook the macaroni according to package directions. Drain and rinse with cold water to cool.

Prepare the apples: While the macaroni is cooling, dice the unpeeled apples.

Make the dressing: In a saucepan, whisk together the sugar, lemon juice, eggs, and flour.  Cook the mixture over medium heat, stirring constantly, until it thickens and is smooth. Remove from heat and allow it to cool.

Combine the salad: In a large bowl, combine the cooled macaroni, diced apples, and crushed pineapple.

Add the dressing: Pour the cooled dressing over the macaroni and fruit mixture and stir to coat evenly.

Chill: Cover the bowl and refrigerate for several hours or overnight to allow the flavors to blend.

Prepare the topping: Just before serving, whip the cream until stiff peaks form.

Serve: Gently fold the whipped cream into the salad or top each serving with whipped cream.

ingredientList:
16 ounces pasta shells
1 pound bacon bits
1 1/2 cups light ranch salad dressing
1 small onion chopped
2 tomatoes chopped

1 head broccoli, small pieces
1/2 red onion, sliced thin
8 slices bacon, fried and crumbled
1/2 cup cashews, split (can also use pecans)
1 cup chopped celery
1 - 2 cups green and red grapes, may be sliced or left whole
1 cup miracle whip
1/3 cup sugar
1 tablespoon apple cider vinegar (or a little more)
recipeText:
Mix the miracle whip, sugar, and vinegar.  

Add the other ingredients an hour or two before serving.

ingredientList:
5 cups diced chicken
2 tablespoons orange juice
1 teaspoon salt
1 1/2 cups green seedless grapes
1 cup pineapple tidbits
1 1/2 cups kraft miracle whip
2 teaspoons oils
2 teaspoons vinegar
3 cups macaroni
1 1/2 cups celery
1 cup toasted almonds or chopped walnuts

2 tablespoons salad oil
2 tablespoons orange juice
2 tablespoons vinegar
1 teaspoon salt
3 cups cooked chicken, diced
1 cup mandarin oranges, drained
1 cup pineapple tidbits, drained
1 cup red or green seedless grapes
1 cup slivered almonds
1 cup celery, cut up
3/4 cup mayonnaise (not miracle whip)
recipeText:
Combine oil, juice, vinegar, and salt.  Add chicken and marinade for 15 minutes.

Combine oranges, pineapple, grapes, almonds, and celery.  Add to chicken mixture.  Fold in mayo.

recipeName: Chicken Salad - I Think Oak Hills
ingredientList:
3 cups cooked chicken cubed
2 cups grated carrots
1 cup diced celery
3 hard cooked eggs, cut up
1 teaspoon grated onions
1/2 teaspoon prepared mustard
1 teaspoon sweet pickle relish
1 to 1 1/4 th cups miracle whip
1/4 teaspoon dill weed
shoestring potatoes
recipeText:
Mix together the chicken, carrots, celery, and egg.

In a separate bowl, mix onions, mustard, relish, miracle whip, and dill weed.  

Mix all ingredients together.  

Chill salad at least 2 hours before serving.

When ready to serve, fold in 4 to 5 ounces shoestring potatoes.

ingredientList:
2 tablespoons salad oil
2 tablespoons orange juice concentrate
2 teaspoons white vinegar
1 teaspoon salt
3 cups cooked chicken diced
1 cup mandarin oranges optional
1 cup pineapple tidbits drained
1 cup red seedless grapes
1 cup slivered almonds
1 cup cut celery
3/4 cup mayonnaise not Miracle whip
recipeText:
Combine oil, juice, vinegar, salt. and Chicken.  Marinate for 15 minutes.  Then drain juice.

Combine oranges, pineapple, grapes almonds, and celery. Add to chicken and fold in mayo.

ingredientList:
1 package cherry jello
1 package lemon jello
2 cups hot water
1 apple, well chopped
1 peeled orange, keep peel and chop
1 pound cranberries
1 cup sugar
recipeText: Mix all ingredients and let set.

ingredientList:
7 cucumbers, sliced
1/2 cup peppers, cut small (optional)
1 cup onions, cut small
2 cups sugar
1 cup vinegar
recipeText: Mix all ingredients.  Let stand 1 1/2 to 2 hours.  You can freeze this if desired.

ingredientList:
1/2 cup water
1/2 cup vinegar
1 tablespoon sugar
onions, sliced
salt
cucumbers, sliced
recipeText:
Mix water, vinegar, sugar, and onions. 

Salt the cucumbers and soak in the vinegar mixture.

ingredientList:
2 tablespoons cornstarch
1/2 cup sugar
1/2 teaspoon salt
1 cup pineapple juice
2 egg yolks, beaten
1 cup whipped cream
1 can pineapple tidbits
1 can fruit cocktail
1 cup miniature marshmallows
2 or 3 bananas, sliced
Nuts
recipeText:
Cook the cornstarch, sugar, salt, pineapple juice, and egg yolks until thick.  

Add the remaining ingredients except bananas.  Chill overnight.  Add bananas before serving.

ingredientList:
1/4 cup sugar
1 tablespoon cider vinegar
1 16-ounce carton heavy cream
Romaine lettuce
recipeText:
Whip the cream into semi-thick consistency, add sugar and vinegar and whip until mixed.  

Chop lettuce and mix into cream mixture.  Serve.

ingredientList:
1 package (3-1/2 ounce) instant vanilla pudding
1 1/2 cups cold milk
2 cups cool whip
1 20-ounce can fruit cocktail, drained
1 16-ounce can pineapple chunks, drained
1 (11-ounce) can mandarin oranges
8 ounces miniature marshmallows
3 bananas, sliced
recipeText:
Combine pudding mix and milk in a bowl.  Mix well. Fold in whipped topping.    

Add remaining ingredients, except bananas, and chill.  

Just before serving, fold in sliced bananas.

ingredientList:
1 cup mandarin oranges
1 2/3 cups pineapple chunks or crushed
1 cup flaked coconut
1 cup sour cream cultured
1 cup miniature marshmallows
1/3 cup red cherries
recipeText:
Combine ingredients and chill overnight.

*can use fruit cocktail.

ingredientList:
1/4 cup sugar
2 tablespoons flour
1 egg
Juice from fruit cocktail
Any fruits you want
recipeText:
Boil the ingredients (except fruit) until thick.  

Then add whatever fruits you desire.

ingredientList:
2 cups cooked rice, cold
14 ounces can crushed pineapple, drained
1/4 cup sugar
1 cup mini marshmallows
1 cup whipping cream
1 tablespoon sugar
1 teaspoon vanilla
1 jar maraschino cherries
recipeText:
Mix rice, pineapple, 1/4 cup. sugar and marshmallows in a bowl.

Whip cream, 1 tablespoon sugar, and vanilla until stiff.

Fold into rice mixture.

Chill.

Decorate with maraschino cherries or slices of fresh pineapple.

ingredientList:
4 3-ounce packages jello, any flavor
2 1/2 cups boiling water or apple juice
recipeText:
Completely dissolve gelatin in boiling water.  Pour into a 13" x 9" pan.  Chill until firm, about 3 hours.  

Cut into squares or use cookie cutters to make different shapes.  

To remove shapes, dip pan in warm water for approximately 15 seconds. Lift shapes from pan.

ingredientList:
6-ounce box orange jello
6-ounce frozen orange juice concentrate
2 11-ounce cans mandarin oranges, drained
20-ounce can crushed pineapple, do not drain

Topping:
1 c cod
1- 3 3/4 instant lemon pudding mixes
1 cup milk
1/2 pint cream whipped
recipeText:
Dissolve jello in boiling water.  Stir in orange juice, cool.  Add oranges and pineapple.

Put mixture in 9 x13 pan.  

Refrigerate several hours or overnight.

Beat pudding mix with milk until slightly firm.  Fold in whipped cream.

Spread on top of jello mixture.

ingredientList:
1 box orange jello
1 box instant vanilla pudding
1 cup boiling water
1/2 cup cold water
1 cool whip 8 oz
1 can mandarin oranges 14 oz oz
1 cup miniature marshmallows
recipeText:
In a large bowl combine orange jello and boiling water.

Whisk until jello is dissolved.

Add cold water and allow to chill for 15 minutes in the refrigerator.

Slowly whisk in vanilla pudding mix until smooth and chill for another 15-20 minutes or until it becomes slightly thickened.

Fold in cool whip, mandarin oranges, and marshmallows.

ingredientList:
1 11-ounce can mandarin oranges
1 20-ounce can pineapple tidbits
1/2 cup maraschino cherries
2 cups cottage cheese
1 3-ounce box orange jello
9 ounces cool whip
recipeText: Mix all together and chill 2 hours.

ingredientList:
Dressing:
juice from 1 lemon
4 egg yolk
2 eggs
1/4 cup sugar

Fruit:
1 can pineapple tidbits, drained
1 can fruit cocktail, drained
marshmallows
1 cup whipped cream
recipeText:
Mix together all dressing ingredients and cook until thick.  Cool to cold.

Mix together the cold dressing, fruit, marshmallows, and whipped cream.

Set overnight.

ingredientList:
8 ounces cream cheese
8 ounces cool whip
1/2 cup sugar
20 ounces crushed pineapple (drained)
1/2 cup butter
1/3 cup sugar
1/2 cup pecans or almonds (chopped)
1 1/3 cups pretzels (crushed)
recipeText:
Mix the first four ingredients and chill.

Melt the butter and stir in sugar, nuts, and pretzels. Bake 350° for 8 - 10 minutes. Cool.

Mix with the chilled ingredients when ready to serve.

ingredientList:
1/2 Shredded lettuce
1/2 jar real bacon bits
1/2 cup Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese
1/2 cup garlic croutons
1/4 cup blue cheese dressing
1/4 cup French salad dressing
1/4 cup thousand island salad dressing

1 cup shredded coconut
1 cup nuts
1 cup marshmallows
1 cup cottage cheese
1 cup sour cream
1 cup crushed pineapple, well drained
1 cup fruit cocktail, drained
recipeText: Combine all ingredients.  Refrigerate overnight.

recipeName: Seven Layer Lettuce Salad - Diane Wellmann
ingredientList:
1 head lettuce
1 (11-ounce) bag frozen peas
1 cup diced celery
1 sweet onion chopped
1/2 cup green peppers chopped
4 hard boiled eggs diced
1 pound bacon fried Crisp
2 cups kraft miracle whip
1 package grated Cheddar cheese
recipeText:
layer Ingredients.

Miracle whip on top.

Then cheese on top of it all.

ingredientList:
3 apples unpeeled, cut up in small pieces
4 bananas, cut up in about 1/4 inch pieces
5 regular or about 20 small snicker bars, cut up
maraschino cherries about 15-20, cut in half
1 pint whipped cream (can use cool whip)
recipeText: Fold all ingredients together.

ingredientList:
2 bags spinach or one big box
2 pounds sliced strawberries

DRESSING
1/2 cup sugar
1/2 cup oils
1/4 cup wine vinegar
1/4 teaspoon paprika
1/4 teaspoon Worcestershire sauce
1 tablespoon poppy seeds vinegar
2 tablespoons sesame seeds (I don't use)
recipeText:
Bev's Mixes salad greens

Box of spring salad greens

Box of Baby spinach

Dried Cranberries

Roasted pecan pieces

Blue cheese crumbles

Lots of Fresh red seedless Grapes

Lots of sliced strawberries

Dressing apply just before serving and toss

Then Bev said she got smart and used Raspberry Walnut dressing and put that in a pint jar and added 1 Tablespoon poppy seeds, shake it up good, worked great.

ingredientList:
2 7 oz boxes ring macaroni
1 cup celery
1 cup onions
2 cups cucumbers
2 cups carrots
1/4 teaspoon pepper
1 1/2 teaspoons nutmeg
1 1/2 cups miracle whip
1 1/2 cups sugar
1 teaspoon salt
1/2 cup vinegar
recipeText:
Mix all, refrigerate overnight or for few hours.

For luncheon add chopped Ham or other meat.

ingredientList:
1 3-ounce box lime jello
1 3-ounce box cherry jello
1 3-ounce box lemon jello
1 20-ounce can crushed pineapple
1 8-ounce package cream cheese
1 cup heavy cream
4 1/2 cups water
recipeText:
Dissolve lime jello in one cup of boiling water.  Add 1/2 cup cold water (or less for firmer jello).  Pour into a 9" x 9" pan.  Cool.  

Repeat with each of the other flavors.  

Whip the heavy cream until stiff peaks form.  Mix in the cream cheese and crushed pineapple.  

Cut jello into squares.  Gently fold the jello squares into the cream mixture.  Chill until ready to serve.

ingredientList:
2 packages strawberry jello
2 cups boiling water
2 boxes frozen strawberries, thawed
1 20-ounce can crushed pineapple
2 large bananas, mashed
3/4 cup cultured sour cream
Walnuts (optional)
recipeText:
Mix all ingredients except sour cream.  

Put half of the mixture in a mold and chill until set.  

Add sour cream to the other half of the jello mixture and pour over set jello.

ingredientList:
1 12 oz macaroni shell
1 cup diced ham
3/4 cup celery
1/2 cup onions
2 cups frozen peas
1 cup shredded chese
5 hard boiled eggs diced
1 1/2 cups mircle whip
salt to taste
pepper to taste

noodles
thousand island salad dressing
western dressing
chicken
or
beef Taco
olives
onion
peppers
use crushed Doritos if you have

1 head lettuce use shredded Lettuce
4 tomatoes chunked can use more
1/2 cup onions
2 pounds hamberger
shredded cheese
2 packages toco seasoning mix
1 can sliced ripe olive large can
Nacho Doritos
Western Dressing (or Thousand Island dressing)
can also add thousand island dressing to this
recipeText:
Brown Hamburger, drain fat.  Add taco seasoning and water, mixed according to package directions.

Simmer until moisture is gone.

Mix all together except western dressing. Add just before serving.

ingredientList:
1 16-ounce bag macaroni, cooked, drained, cooled
1 9-ounce package tuna
2 bread and butter pickles
1/4 cup miracle whip
recipeText: Mix the above ingredients together.  Serve cold.

ingredientList:
2 eggs
8 ounces corkscrew pasta
1 cup sugar snap peas, about 4 oz, trimmed
1/2 cup buttermilk
1/3 cup mayonnaise
3 tablespoons chopped fresh dill, divided
1 teaspoon cider vinegar
3/4 teaspoon salt
1/4 teaspoon pepper
1 cup diced celery
1 diced carrot
3 radishes, halved and sliced
1/4 cup chopped gherkin pickles
2 tablespoons chopped red onions
12 ounces solid white tuna in water, drained
1 head Boston lettuce, separated into leaves
recipeText:
In a pot over high heat, combine eggs with enough water to cover by 1"; bring to boil.  Cover.  Remove from heat; let stand 15 minutes.  Drain.  Cover eggs with cold water.  When cool, peel and chop.  

Cook pasta according to package directions, adding snap peas during last 2 minutes of cooking time.  Drain; rinse under cold water.  Drain; set aside.  

In a large bowl combine buttermilk, mayonnaise, 2 tablespoons dill, vinegar, salt and pepper.  Stir in pasta mixture, celery, carrots, radishes, pickles, and onion.  Gently stir in tuna.  

Arrange lettuce in large shallow serving bowl.  Spoon pasta into center.  Sprinkle with egg and remaining dill.

ingredientList:
2 cups pasta
1 cup tuna
1/2 chopped celery
1/2 cup shredded Cheddar cheese
1 1/2 cups miracle whip dressing
2 tablespoons mustard
1/4 cup sugar
salt and pepper to taste

3 diced apples do not peel
1/2 cup chopped celery
2 to 3 tablespoons mayonnaise
1/8 teaspoon salt
1/4 cup chopped nuts
recipeText: We like it better with 1/2 cup whipped cream mixed with mayonnaise.

ingredientList:
1-20 ounces crushed pineapple
1 can cherry pie filling
1 can sweetened condensed milk
2/3 cup chopped pecans
1-8 ounces cool whip
recipeText:
Drain pineapple and mix with pie filling.

Add condensed milk and pecans. Fold in whipped topping.

Chill for several hours.

ingredientList:
3 slices bacon (cut into 1-inch pieces)
1 can (6.5 - 7.5 ounces) minced clams, drained with juice set aside
1 medium onion, chopped
1 large potato, cubed
1 can cream of celery soup
1 1/2 cups milk
Dash pepper
Oyster crackers
recipeText:
Fry bacon in medium skillet over medium heat until crisp.  Remove bacon to paper towel to drain.  Discard all but two tablespoons bacon drippings.  Saute onions in drippings 4 - 5 minutes.  

Add the clam juice and potatoes.  Cover and cook over low heat until potatoes are tender (about 15 minutes).  Reserve a few pieces of bacon for garnish.  

Add remaining bacon, minced clams, cream of celery soup, milk, and pepper.  Cook over low heat until heated through.  

Garnish with reserved bacon.  Serve with crackers if desired.

ingredientList:
10 ounces frozen raspberries, blueberries, strawberries, peaches, or mixed fruit
1 cup water
1/4 cup sugar
2 cinnamon sticks
Dash nutmeg
Dash ground cloves
1 tablespoon water
1 tablespoon cornstarch
2 tablespoons lemon juice
1 cup sour cream
1/2 cup milk
recipeText:
Drain fruit, save syrup.  In saucepan, combine syrup, 1 cup water, sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg, cloves.  Boil.  Reduce heat & simmer for 5 minutes.  Remove cinnamon sticks.  

Blend 1 TBSP water and cornstarch; stir into saucepan.  Cook & stir until thickened and bubbly.  Remove from heat.  Add lemon juice.  

Cool to room temperature.  Blend in sour cream and fruit.  Stir in milk.  Cover and chill.

ingredientList:
3 tablespoons tapioca
1 cup water
1/2 cup sugar
6 ounces frozen orange juice concentrate
1 box frozen strawberries
16 ounces pineapple tidbits (with juice)
1 can mandarin oranges, drained
1 can mixed fruits, drained
recipeText:
Cook tapioca, water, and sugar until thick, then add the other ingredients.

Chill.  Serve in sherbet glass with a dab of whipped cream.

ingredientList:
8 slices bacon, cut into small pieces (or use bacon bits)
1 cup chopped onions (or used equivalent in dry minced onions)
1 cup sour cream
1 small can cream of chicken soup
Dash salt
Dash pepper
2 tablespoons parsley flakes
1 quart cubed potatoes
1/4 cup milk
recipeText:
Brown bacon and onions.  Drain fat and add to potatoes.  Cover with just enough water to cook until potatoes are tender.  

Add sour cream and chicken soup, and enough milk to achieve desired consistency.  Heat until hot, but do not boil.  Sprinkle with parsley flakes.  

Refrigerate overnight to achieve better flavor.

ingredientList:
4 cups ham broth or water
2-3 cups cubed fully cooked ham
4 cups diced potatoes peeled
1 cup sliced carrots
1/2 cup chopped onions
1/2 teaspoon pepper
1/2 cup butter cubed
1/2 cup flour
4 cups milk
4 cups cheddar cheese, shredded
recipeText:
In a large saucepan, combine broth or water, potatoes, carrots, onion and pepper. Bring to a boil, reduce heat. Cover and cook for 10-15 minutes or until vegetables are tender.

Meanwhile, in another saucepan, melt butter. Stir in flour until smooth. Gradually add the milk.  Bring to a boil and stir for 2 minutes or until thickened. 

Stir in cheese until melted. Stir into undrained potato Mixture.  Add ham and peas. Heat through.


*Make a double batch, this goes fast.

ingredientList:
20 pounds tomatoes
1 bunch celery
5 onions
1/4 cup sugar
1/4 cup salt
recipeText:
Boil tomatoes, celery, and onions for about one hour.  

Then add sugar and salt to the mixture and boil for 10 minutes.


*To make into sauce:
add about 2 green peppers
2/3 cup vinegar
1 Tablespoon celery seed
a little mustard and garlic powder

ingredientList:
1 cup uncooked wild rice
3 cups boiling water
2 strips smoked bacon
1/4 cup chopped onions
3/4 cup sliced celery
1/2 cup sliced carrots
14 1/2 ounces chicken broth
2 cans cream of mushroom soup
2 soup cans full of milk
1 4-ounce can mushrooms, undrained
1 teaspoon seasoned salt
Dash pepper
recipeText:
Combine rice and boiling water in large saucepan; simmer, covered, 50 - 60 minutes.  Drain off excess liquid and set aside.  

In a skillet, fry bacon until crisp.  Remove bacon, crumble and set aside.  

Drain all but 1 tablespoon of drippings; saute onion, celery, and carrots. 

In a large kettle, combine broth, soup, milk, mushrooms, seasoned salt, pepper, and crumbled bacon, sauteed vegetables, and wild rice.  

Cover and simmer for 1 hour.

ingredientList:
25 pounds pork 
5 pounds beef
8 ounces Sea salt
1 1/2 ounces black pepper
1/8 ounce garlic powder
1 pound dry milk powder
1 ounce curling salt
recipeText:
Mix all ingredients with 2 cups water then mix with meat.

Refrigerate for 2 hours prior to stuffing.

Smoke for 2 to 3 hours.

Bring to boil cook for 10 minutes at least.
